#summary Declaring funcions and using.

= Function =

Is allowed four aways to defining functions:

First way:
{{{
    funcName(param1, param2) #
        ...
    #
}}}

Second way:
{{{
    funcName(param1 param2) #
        ...
    #
}}}

Third way:
{{{
    funcName param1, param2 #
        ...
    #
}}}

Forth way:
{{{
    funcName param1 param2 #
        ...
    #
}}}

Case not have parameters:
{{{
    funcName() #
        ...
    #

    // OR

    funcName #
        ...
    #
}}}

===Return:===

The return sign is "~".
{{{
    funcName #
        ~ 1
    #
}}}

===Calls:===

Always with parenthesis and commas:
{{{
    // Without parameters
    funcName()

    // With parameters
    funcName1(1)
    funcName2(1, 2)
    funcName2(x, y)
}}}
